remarks: A representation of explicit substitution of a class for a variable, inferred from an implicit substitution hypothesis.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Aug-1993.)
statement:
ceqsalv.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
ceqsalv.2 $e |- ( x = A -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
ceqsalv $p |- ( A. x ( x = A -> ph ) <-> ps ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ps x $.
